channel.title: Creating tags on your Client with Sprites
channel.description:
[B]Download's Recommended for this Guide:[/B] [DIRECT LINK]:[URL=http://"http://sourceforge.net/projects/gimp-win/files/GIMP%20%2B%20GTK%2B%20%28stable%20release%29/GIMP%202.6.11%20%2B%20GTK%2B%202.16.6/gimp-2.6.11-i686-setup-1.exe/download"]GIMP[/URL] ____________________________________________ [B]Recommended Source:[/B] [size=12pt]ANY[/size] ____________________________________________ [B]To be edited:[/B] Sprites (ONLY) ____________________________________________ Step 1: METHOD ONE WITH A CACHE Go to:
My Computer > C:
(Then find your Cache file that runs on your Client). Step 1: METHOD TWO Go to:
Your Client > Sprites
-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-__-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_- Step 2: Select your dezired picture to edit,and do the following: AFTER GIMP has been installed LEFT CLICK the picture and select
Edit with GIMP
Now,wait till GIMP has finished loading the files.Once loaded click on the Text Button and choose the dezired position to put your text in,then choose a font & size and you are done. [B]NOTE: WHAT WE DID THERE [U]IS[/U] TAGGING.[/B] ______________________________________________ Guide finished. Side Notes: Easy and does not need any experience. Regards, PureZiZ

item.title: Creating tags on your Client with Sprites
item.dc:creator: @PureZiZ PureZiZ
item.description:
@PureZiZ wrote:

Downloadâ€™s Recommended for this Guide:

Recommended Source:

[size=12pt]ANY[/size]

To be edited:

Sprites (ONLY)

Step 1: METHOD ONE
WITH A CACHE

Go to:

My Computer > C:
(Then find your Cache file that runs on your Client).

Step 1: METHOD TWO

Go to:

Your Client > Sprites

---------__---------_-

Step 2:

Select your dezired picture to edit,and do the following:

AFTER GIMP has been installed LEFT CLICK the picture and select

Edit with GIMP

Now,wait till GIMP has finished loading the files.Once loaded click on the Text Button and choose the dezired position to put your text in,then choose a font & size and you are done.

NOTE: WHAT WE DID THERE IS TAGGING.

Guide finished.
Side Notes: Easy and does not need any experience.

Regards,
PureZiZ
